trans-unit.source: Specifies the visibility of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> for scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: Angir synligheten for en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> for rullbare innhold.

trans-unit.source: Use this enumeration to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility%2A> property values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne opplistingen til å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility%2A>egenskapsverdiene for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility%2A>

trans-unit.source: The member values of this enumeration specify <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> visibility in a given direction.
trans-unit.target: Medlemmet verdiene i denne opplisting angi <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>synlighet i en gitt retning.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: These member values also specify whether the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> dimension is applied to its enclosed content.
trans-unit.target: Verdier for disse også angi om den tilsvarende <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>dimensjonen brukes til innholdet vedlagte.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: When you apply the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> content, you set the viewport size for the content.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>innhold, du har angitt VISNINGSPORT størrelsen på innholdet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> appears and the dimension of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> is applied to the content when the viewport cannot display all of the content.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> vises, og dimensjonen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> brukes på innholdet når VISNINGSPORTEN ikke kan vise alt innhold.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, the width of the content is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>. For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, the height of the content is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: For en vannrett <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, bredden på innholdet som er satt til den <> </> *> av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>. For en loddrett <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, høyden på innholdet som er satt til den <> </> *> av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> does not appear even when the viewport cannot display all of the content.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> vises ikke selv når VISNINGSPORTEN kan ikke vise alt innhold.

trans-unit.source: The dimension of the content is set to the corresponding dimension of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> parent.
trans-unit.target: Dimensjonen på innholdet som er satt til den tilsvarende dimensjonen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> overordnede.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, the width of the content is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>. For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, the height of the content is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: For en vannrett <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, bredden på innholdet som er satt til den <> </> *> av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>. For en loddrett <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, høyden på innholdet som er satt til den <> </> *> av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> does not appear even when the viewport cannot display all of the content.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> vises ikke selv når VISNINGSPORTEN kan ikke vise alt innhold.

trans-unit.source: The dimension of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> is not applied to the content.
trans-unit.target: Dimensjonen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> gjelder ikke for innholdet.

trans-unit.source: The dimension of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> is applied to the content.
trans-unit.target: Dimensjonen for den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> brukes til innholdet.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, the width of the content is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>. For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, the height of the content is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: For en vannrett <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, bredden på innholdet som er satt til den <> </> *> av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>. For en loddrett <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, høyden på innholdet som er satt til den <> </> *> av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.
